mapper.select: select to_char(forecasttime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as forecasttime from ( select * from t_zh_grid_forecast order by ddatetime desc,venueid asc,forecasttime asc ) where rownum<=88 order by rownum asc

select * from( (select * from( select * from t_zh_grid_forecast where forecasttime=to_date(#{forecasttime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') order by ddatetime desc,venueid asc,forecasttime asc ) where rownum<=287 order by rownum asc) f left join t_zh_grid_point_5k p on f.venueid=p.recid)

select venueid,wspd10m,forecasttime from( select * from t_zh_grid_forecast where forecasttime=to_date(#{forecasttime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and (venueid=234 or venueid=256 or venueid=257 or venueid=258 or venueid=260 or venueid=268 or venueid=269) order by ddatetime desc,venueid asc,forecasttime asc ) where rownum<=7 order by rownum asc
select recid as venueid,x,y from t_zh_grid_point_5k
